CodeBlockMethod.Name: description
CodeBlockMethod.Code: -- 건물 체력 관련 모델인 BuildingHpBarText 모델에서 사용하는 컴포넌트 -- 현재 건물 체력 text로 표시 및 갱신

CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBeginPlay
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local Building = self.Entity.Parent.Parent
wait(0.1) if Building.TagComponent.Tags:Contains("building") then self.MaxHp = Building.Building.BuildingInfo["MaxHp"] self.Hp = Building.Building.Hp elseif Building.TagComponent.Tags:Contains("monsterbuilding") then self.MaxHp = Building.MonsterBuilding.MaxHp self.Hp = Building.MonsterBuilding.Hp end
self.Entity.TextComponent.FontSize = 30 self.Text = math.floor(self.Hp) .. " / " .. math.floor(self.MaxHp)

CodeBlockMethod.Name: SetHp
CodeBlockMethod.Code: self.Hp = Hp self.MaxHp = MaxHp self.Text = math.floor(self.Hp) .. " / " .. math.floor(self.MaxHp) self.Entity.Parent:GetChildByName("BuildingHpBarForeground", true).InitBuildingHpBarForeground:SetHpBarSize(self.MaxHp, self.Hp)
